title: Unacademy Round One: Average Feedback, Stabilized Energy, No Spiral
summary: Faced the first round of Unacademy interview today. Performance was rated as average — neither strong nor disqualifying. Accepted the outcome without emotional overreaction. Scheduled for the second round tomorrow. Overall energy felt better compared to recent weeks, possibly due to Lamotrigine effect. Managed to study and reflect without major drift. Routine held. No identity agitation.
mood: 5.5 — slight fatigue but no drift, emotionally grounded, subtle energy return
emotion: flat-neutral baseline with brief spikes of anticipation and self-check; no elevation, no spiral
notable_insights: Average feedback did not trigger over-analysis or self-devaluation.
Energy may be returning gradually, possibly due to medication consistency.
Study and routine continued without emotional pressure or avoidance.
Acceptance of interview ambiguity is improving — no need to control outcome mentally.
Emotional energy is being conserved for execution, not overreaction.
closure: No emotional overcompensation. Structure held. Tomorrow is treated as one block of output, not a referendum on self-worth.
